channel.title: DeceptionPk! - Full Pking 24hours Of Every Day!
channel.description:
Hello Guys!
Welcome to the one and only Deception Pk Server!
To play just download our wonderful client (Uploaded to MediaFire for fast download): http://www.mediafire.com/?1o5c3ft8no5emns
Our intro to you:
Depection started back in 2011 and within 1week we had over 500+votes! as we started getting more popular and more popular more and more problems we had to fix, we fought our way though them all until that 1month when we were hit with 12 DDoS'ers and for the safety of out players we had no choice other than closing down, but we are here to stay, for good!
So what are you waiting for join fast and start for quest to become the #1 Deception Pker!
[b][u]Some Questions:[/u][/b]
[u][b]How Is Deception Hosted?:[/b][/u] - It is hosted on a vps from: vpsland.com - which means it is online 24/7!
[b][u]What Is Your Website?:[/u][/b] - We currently don't have a website due to the shear fact I have no offical web designer.
[u][b]What Is Deception's Server Goals?:[/b][/u] - Our main priority is to give our players the best possible time they can have! - To satisfy all our players.
[b][u]Can We Donate?:[/u][/b] - Yes, you will get donator crown + donator points to buy rares and 2 sets of pking gear!
[b][u]Can Anyone Get Staff?:[/u][/b] - Yes, But They Have To Earn It, No Asking For Staff At All.
[b][u]What Is The Server About?:[/u][/b] - Deception is all about Pking!
Thanks for reading!
- Jamie
Skype: imtoorich

item.title: DeceptionPk! - Full Pking 24hours Of Every Day!
item.dc:creator: @ImToRich ImToRich
item.description:
@ImToRich wrote:

Hello Guys!

Welcome to the one and only Deception Pk Server!

To play just download our wonderful client (Uploaded to MediaFire for fast download): http://www.mediafire.com/?1o5c3ft8no5emns

Our intro to you:

Depection started back in 2011 and within 1week we had over 500+votes! as we started getting more popular and more popular more and more problems we had to fix, we fought our way though them all until that 1month when we were hit with 12 DDoS’ers and for the safety of out players we had no choice other than closing down, but we are here to stay, for good!

So what are you waiting for join fast and start for quest to become the #1 Deception Pker!

Some Questions:

How Is Deception Hosted?:

  • It is hosted on a vps from: vpsland.com - which means it is online 24/7!

What Is Your Website?:

  • We currently don’t have a website due to the shear fact I have no offical web designer.

What Is Deception’s Server Goals?:

  • Our main priority is to give our players the best possible time they can have!
  • To satisfy all our players.

Can We Donate?:

  • Yes, you will get donator crown + donator points to buy rares and 2 sets of pking gear!

Can Anyone Get Staff?:

  • Yes, But They Have To Earn It, No Asking For Staff At All.

What Is The Server About?:

  • Deception is all about Pking!

Thanks for reading!

  • Jamie

Skype: imtoorich
